title: Rule 16

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Select a player at night, and give them any ability in the GIM thread, if they dont already have it. Any. Ability. No exceptions. Also you do not choose its random which ability they get.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Impact the game in some way. Host decides if you win

desc:
Post 1974
*Me when I grant the Lookout (51) God (12)'s ability.*
